title: Robbing cars is ironic.
subtitle: A driver frustrated the attempt to steal a car by ignoring a "body" lying on the road, and accidentally killed four of her potential attackers.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A single driver detects a "body" dumped on the road but turns around instead of stopping to investigate. She later discovered that she had made the right decision, and she led the four men waiting for her.
